es_incloop.descr:
Performs an incrementing loop (from start to end with step).

:es_incloop(start, end, step, , [List initParams])

The function is called once with given parameters during setup. Then it's called every frame with the counter parameter passed to the function in X and Y registers (the counter is 16 bits). Stop when counter >= end
es_incloop.name: Increment lopp
